body.content:
Dear friend,

Thanks for your urgent response and interest in this business deal. I
believe with trust we will achieve success like one family, this is a
great opportunity for both of us.

As you already know I am Mr. John Collins, a Banker from Lome Republic
of Togo. There is a fund which I want you to help me receive in your
bank account, the total amount is ($7.2 million USD) the fund belongs
to a foreign late client without a next of kin as he died in a drastic
car accident with his entire family years ago. I want to present you
as the next of kin so that the fund will be transferred to your bank
account. I cannot work alone without a foreigner who will act as my
partner and beneficiary of the fund because of my work and position. I
guarantee that this will be executed under a legitimate arrangement
that will protect both of us, as it is 100% risk free for both
parties.

However, I have decided to give you 50% of the total sum for your role
and participation in this transaction and any expenses that might
incurred in the course of this transaction will be taken care by  both
of us

I want us to put hands together in order to achieve this great
financial opportunity and smiles together like one family

Your response is urgently needed to enable me to proceed without any
further delay.

Thanks!!
Yours Partner
Mr. John Collins

On 8/17/21, sasha@asdfghjkl.ovh <sasha@asdfghjkl.ovh> wrote:
> Hello,
> how can I help you with this?
>
> Sincerely
> Sasha
>
>
